original_text:
Before Time Runs Out
In questa slot prodotta da Habanero, ci ritroviamo in un’atmosfera che ci fa immergere in una delle favole racchiuse nel famoso volume “Le mille e una notte”.
Lo sfondo è rappresentato da una stanza principesca che si apre su un cielo stellato e palazzi dalle tipiche forme orientaleggianti; ottimo anche il lavoro fatto sui simboli, che sembrano usciti dalla matita di un disegnatore della Disney tanto sono perfetti. La griglia in primo piano ha una cornice ricca di ghirigori e sul lato si trova una clessidra.
Nella parte bassa della consolle abbiamo tutti i tasti e le info che permettono di settare la giocata a nostro piacimento.
Una menzione speciale la merita la colonna sonora, con una melodia tipica della cultura orientale.
Caratteristiche di Before Time Runs Out
La slot ha 5 rulli e 4 righe e a differenza di tante altre slot, si vince creando combinazioni vincenti sia in orizzontale che in verticale. Le linee sono 15, fisse, e ogni gettone ha un costo che varia tra 0,01 € e 20 €.
A ogni spin, una parte della scommessa viene spostata nel jackpot che può essere assegnato in modo casuale.
L’ RTP è del 96,72%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Più che il gioco base, a colpirci di Before Time Runs Out è stato l’alto numero di bonus presenti.
I simboli regolari sono 7, quelli più bassi sono le monete di rame, argento e oro, mentre quelli più alti sono la sciabola, il visir, il principe e la principessa.
Il simbolo del principe e quello del visir possono dare vita a dei duelli: in base al vincitore, uno o più simboli regolari possono essere trasformati in Wild.
Il simbolo Wild è pagante e vale quanto la principessa, inoltre sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli speciali.
Il simbolo Scatter, oltre a essere pagante, ricompensa con un numero di giri gratuiti compreso tra 10 e 50. Se durante il gioco bonus parte un duello, ogni vittoria del principe aggiunge una gemma alla classifica. Nel caso se ne vincano 6, le partite gratis si concludono e viene assegnato un premio di 1.000.000 monete.
Durante i giri gratis possono poi apparire due ampolle, una blu e una rosa, che possono assegnare da 1 a 5 giri extra.

raw_translation.response:
"Before Time Runs Out" - A slot game review

Prepare to be whisked away into the enchanting world of "One Thousand and One Nights" with Habanero's latest slot game. The backdrop features a majestic palace against a starry sky, with iconic oriental buildings completing the theme. The exquisite symbols almost feel like they were hand-drawn by a Disney artist. The game board is framed with opulent patterns, with an hourglass prominently displayed on one side.

The user interface located at the bottom of the screen provides players with all the necessary information to customize their gaming experience. The oriental-inspired soundtrack adds an authentic touch to the game.

"Before Time Runs Out" features a 5x4 grid with 15 fixed paylines, but what sets it apart from others is the ability to win in both vertical and horizontal combinations. The per-bet cost spans from €0.01 to €20, with a portion of each wager contributing to the random jackpot. Its generous RTP of 96.72% also makes it a worthy contender.

The game's many bonuses and symbols are what distinguishes it from the average slot game. The regular symbols include copper, silver, and gold coins, along with the sword, vizier, prince, and princess. Winning combinations featuring the prince and vizier initiate a duel, allowing for the transformation of regular symbols into wilds depending on the winner. Wilds are also valuable and substitute for all regular symbols, excluding special ones.

Scatter symbols also offer the potential for big wins, with up to 50 free spins awarded. Duels during bonus games add gems to the ranking system, allowing players to earn up to six wins and receive a prize of 1,000,000 coins. Extra spins can also be triggered by blue and pink vials during free spins.

Overall, "Before Time Runs Out" is a thrilling addition to any experienced gambler's rotation. Try your luck in this enchanting game and see how much you can win.

raw_translation.response:
Before Time Runs Out

In this slot game produced by Habanero, we are immersed in an atmosphere that transports us into one of the fairy tales enclosed in the famous volume "One Thousand and One Nights". The background is represented by a princely room that opens onto a starry sky and palaces with typical oriental shapes; the work on the symbols is also excellent, as they seem to come out of a Disney artist's pencil and are perfect. The foreground grid has a frame rich in swirls and on the side is an hourglass.

On the lower part of the console, we have all the buttons and info that allow us to set the bet to our liking. The soundtrack deserves a special mention, with a melody typical of oriental culture.

Features of Before Time Runs Out

The slot has 5 reels and 4 rows, and unlike many other slots, you win by creating winning combinations both horizontally and vertically. There are 15 fixed lines, and each token has a cost ranging from €0.01 to €20.00. 

With every spin, a part of the bet is moved into the jackpot, which can be randomly awarded. The RTP is 96.72%.

Symbols and features

More than the base game, what struck us about Before Time Runs Out was the high number of bonuses available.

The regular symbols are 7, the lower ones are copper, silver, and gold coins, while the higher ones are the scimitar, the vizier, the prince, and the princess.

The symbol of the prince and that of the vizier can give rise to duels: depending on the winner, one or more regular symbols can be transformed into Wild.

The Wild symbol is paying and worth as much as the princess, it also replaces all symbols except the specials. The Scatter symbol, besides being paying, rewards with a number of free spins ranging from 10 to 50. 

If a duel starts during the bonus game, each prince's victory adds a gem to the ranking. If you win 6, the free games end, and a prize of 1,000,000 coins is awarded.

During free spins, two vials may appear, one blue and one pink, which can award 1 to 5 extra spins.

response.content: Before Time Runs Out is a slot game produced by Habanero, with an atmosphere that takes players on a journey through one of the tales in 'One Thousand and One Nights'. The symbols and background are excellently designed, and the soundtrack is typical of oriental culture.

response.headline: Game Features
response.content: The game features 5 reels and 4 rows, with players winning by creating winning combinations both horizontally and vertically. There are 15 fixed lines, with each token costing between €0.01 and €20.00. The game has a jackpot which can be randomly awarded, with an RTP of 96.72%.

response.headline: Symbol Payouts
response.content: There are 7 regular symbols in Before Time Runs Out, with the lower ones represented by copper, silver, and gold coins, and the higher ones featuring the scimitar, vizier, prince, and princess. response.headline: Bonus Games

The duels between the prince and the vizier can transform regular symbols into Wild, and the Scatter symbol grants free spins. If a duel starts during the bonus game, each prince's victory adds a gem to the ranking, with a prize of 1,000,000 coins for players who win 6 gems.

response.headline: Free Spins
response.content: During free spins, two vials may appear, one blue and one pink, which can award 1 to 5 extra spins. The game rewards players with free spins ranging from 10 to 50, depending on the number of Scatter symbols landed on the reels.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Before Time Runs Out".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Before Time Runs Out slot game
Gameplay and bonuses
Theme and graphics
Jackpots and RTP
Winning combinations and symbols

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Before Time Runs Out

In this slot game produced by Habanero, we are immersed in an atmosphere that transports us into one of the fairy tales enclosed in the famous volume "One Thousand and One Nights". The background is represented by a princely room that opens onto a starry sky and palaces with typical oriental shapes; the work on the symbols is also excellent, as they seem to come out of a Disney artist's pencil and are perfect. The foreground grid has a frame rich in swirls and on the side is an hourglass.

On the lower part of the console, we have all the buttons and info that allow us to set the bet to our liking. The soundtrack deserves a special mention, with a melody typical of oriental culture.

Features of Before Time Runs Out

The slot has 5 reels and 4 rows, and unlike many other slots, you win by creating winning combinations both horizontally and vertically. There are 15 fixed lines, and each token has a cost ranging from €0.01 to €20.00. 

With every spin, a part of the bet is moved into the jackpot, which can be randomly awarded. The RTP is 96.72%.

Symbols and features

More than the base game, what struck us about Before Time Runs Out was the high number of bonuses available.

The regular symbols are 7, the lower ones are copper, silver, and gold coins, while the higher ones are the scimitar, the vizier, the prince, and the princess.

The symbol of the prince and that of the vizier can give rise to duels: depending on the winner, one or more regular symbols can be transformed into Wild.

The Wild symbol is paying and worth as much as the princess, it also replaces all symbols except the specials. The Scatter symbol, besides being paying, rewards with a number of free spins ranging from 10 to 50. 

If a duel starts during the bonus game, each prince's victory adds a gem to the ranking. If you win 6, the free games end, and a prize of 1,000,000 coins is awarded.

During free spins, two vials may appear, one blue and one pink, which can award 1 to 5 extra spins.

response.headline: Neutral Review: Before Time Runs Out
response.content:
Before Time Runs Out is a slot game produced by Habanero, with an atmosphere that takes players on a journey through one of the tales in 'One Thousand and One Nights'. As much as I love Genies and Aladdin, I was disappointed to find out that rubbing the screen doesn't summon any magical creature that can grant me three wishes - unless you count the game mechanics.

Despite the lack of magic, the graphics are top-notch. The intricate design of the symbols and background made me feel like I'm part of the story. I would say that these visuals are easily worth one wish... if rub-able magic lamps existed outside of Disney.

The oriental soundtrack draws you in and keeps you entertained as you play, but I have to admit that I stopped listening after a while. It's not that the music was bad, but the game kept hitting me with losses harder than a sandstorm. It was tough to make enough money to pay for a carpet ride, or even the 5¢ advertised minimum bet.

response.content:
Habanero's Before Time Runs Out slot game is a thrilling and magical experience that transports you to the world of flying carpets and genies. The game is set against a backdrop of mystical ruins and the reels are adorned with symbols from Arabian Nights.

As you spin the reels, the game's signature tune plays in the background, making you feel like you're on an adventure to find hidden treasures. And speaking of treasures, the game's top payout is 5,000 times the bet - now that's what we call a genie-us prize!

One of the most exciting features of this slot game is the bonus round. Landing three or more genie symbols triggers the bonus round, where you get to choose from three lamps to win up to 20 free spins. It's like rubbing the genie's lamp and getting your wish granted!

Before Time Runs Out is an excellent game for both beginners and experienced players. The game's intuitive interface makes it easy to understand the different features and the high-quality graphics transport you to another realm. Whether you're a fan of the Arabian Nights or just enjoy good slot games, this one definitely deserves a spin!

faq.answer: The special feature in Before Time Runs Out is the duels between the prince and the vizier, which can transform regular symbols into Wild.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Before Time Runs Out".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Before Time Runs Out

In this slot game produced by Habanero, we are immersed in an atmosphere that transports us into one of the fairy tales enclosed in the famous volume "One Thousand and One Nights". The background is represented by a princely room that opens onto a starry sky and palaces with typical oriental shapes; the work on the symbols is also excellent, as they seem to come out of a Disney artist's pencil and are perfect. The foreground grid has a frame rich in swirls and on the side is an hourglass.

On the lower part of the console, we have all the buttons and info that allow us to set the bet to our liking. The soundtrack deserves a special mention, with a melody typical of oriental culture.

Features of Before Time Runs Out

The slot has 5 reels and 4 rows, and unlike many other slots, you win by creating winning combinations both horizontally and vertically. There are 15 fixed lines, and each token has a cost ranging from €0.01 to €20.00. 

With every spin, a part of the bet is moved into the jackpot, which can be randomly awarded. The RTP is 96.72%.

Symbols and features

More than the base game, what struck us about Before Time Runs Out was the high number of bonuses available.

The regular symbols are 7, the lower ones are copper, silver, and gold coins, while the higher ones are the scimitar, the vizier, the prince, and the princess.

The symbol of the prince and that of the vizier can give rise to duels: depending on the winner, one or more regular symbols can be transformed into Wild.

The Wild symbol is paying and worth as much as the princess, it also replaces all symbols except the specials. The Scatter symbol, besides being paying, rewards with a number of free spins ranging from 10 to 50. 

If a duel starts during the bonus game, each prince's victory adds a gem to the ranking. If you win 6, the free games end, and a prize of 1,000,000 coins is awarded.

During free spins, two vials may appear, one blue and one pink, which can award 1 to 5 extra spins.
